FuncDef: This command allows the operator to start and stop on-demand OAM-PM sessions.
CLIs: oam-pm session <session-name> { dmm | lmm | slm | twamp-light } { start | stop }

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the session name that the test is associated with. 32 characters maximum.
Specifies the DMM test that will be affected by the command.
Specifies the LMM test that will be affected by the command.
Specifies the SLM test that will be affected by the command.
Specifies the TWAMP-light test that will be affected by the command.
